name: SEAMLESS_M_FUNC_LEGACY_EARLY_LOADING
steps: Step 1.: Download the microcode for your CPU.
Step 2.: Put the new microcode in /lib/firmware/intel-ucode.
Step 3.: Build new initramfs for the currently running kernel.
Step 4.: Since microcode is loaded early by the initramfs, rebuild it.
Step 5.: Reboot the system to let changes take effect.
summary: Verify if microcode could be updated successfully when triggers early loading process.
